summary: RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE FOR PASSENGER AIRBAG OVER ONE YEAR AGO. RECALL SAID AIRBAG COULD SEND METAL INTO PASSENGER. CONTACTED FORD THEY WILL NOT REPLACE THE AIRBAG AND WILL NOT GIVE ME ANY INFORMATION ON WHEN THEY WILL BE ABLE TO REPLACE THE AIRBAG. FORD HAS NOT OFFERED ANY SOLUTIONS SUCH AS A RENTAL CAR.
